alert.note: Alert for Dodge; Fillmore; Mower; Olmsted; Wabasha (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 04 at 7:21AM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms moving into southeast Minnesota and northeast Iowa... At 717 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Warsaw to 6 miles south of Shell Rock. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds of 30 to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Rochester around 8 AM CDT. Oelwein and Maynard around 810 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Forestville State Park, Bradford, Potsdam, County Roads T 54 And A 31, Mayville, County Roads V 56 And B 33, Waucoma Campground, Alta Vista, Osage Spring Park and Oxbow Park. People attending Harmony 4th of July Celebration, and Soldiers Memorial Field in Rochester should seek safe shelter immediately! This includes Interstate 90 in Minnesota between mile markers 175 and 229. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
